name: Sir Malachar
title: The Knight of Shadows
description: A legendary knight who has fought a thousand battles
lore: Sir Malachar lost his family during the Great War. Now he fights only for revenge.

name: Void Knight
title: Guardian of the Abyss
description: A knight who gazed into the void and was transformed by it

name: Bloodreaver
title: The Bloodthirsty
description: A cursed knight thirsting for blood
lore: Cursed by an ancient pact, Bloodreaver is immortal but must feed on battles.
